pages.name: disclaimer
pages.title: Welcome to Ada. Here are a few things to know about this COVID-19 risk status and treatment options questionnaire.

elements.name: question8
elements.html:
Ada & Pfizer
Pfizer Inc. (“Pfizer”), which manufactures and sells oral prescription medication for COVID-19, has contracted with Ada Health Inc. (“Ada”) for the development, hosting and operation of this questionnaire. Pfizer has no involvement in the onward journey following the questionnaire.
Privacy
Pfizer will not receive any personal information relating to respondents or any of your individual responses. Ada will share with Pfizer only aggregated information related to responses to this questionnaire.
Age requirements
This questionnaire is only for US residents aged 18 or over.
Safety
All guidance and recommendations follow current CDC and FDA guidelines.
If you have health concerns, talk to your healthcare professional. In a medical emergency, call 911.
Intended use
This questionnaire is intended to educate individuals about whether they meet current criteria for high risk for progression to severe COVID-19 and whether oral prescription medication for COVID-19 may be appropriate. This questionnaire is not intended to influence the choice of treatment for COVID-19, and Pfizer has not made or offered any payment to Ada to influence the referral of patients to any Pfizer product. All decisions regarding patient care must be made in consultation with a healthcare professional, considering the unique characteristics of the patient.
Informational purposes only
The health information contained herein is provided for educational purposes only and is not intended to replace discussions with a healthcare professional.

elements.name: ConsentQuestion
elements.title: This questionnaire is by Ada Health, Inc. and is intended only for people based in the USA. To continue, read Ada's privacy policy and confirm the following declarations.

choices.text: I agree to [Ada's privacy policy](https://link-url-here.org)and confirm that I am a US resident and at least 18 years old.

pages.name: Question 1
pages.title: Thanks! Now let's check if you meet the current criteria for high risk for progression to severe COVID-19.
